Summary: Going across Susquehanna river when I saw a saucer hovering above a power line.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Columbia
There were no other sightings in Columbia on or around July 1st 1970
divs: Sighting DetailsActually I have had 4 different alien experiences. 1. The above experience. 2. At a outdoor Jazz concert east of Atlanta, Ga. when I looked up and saw a cigar shaped object fly slowly towards me. This object had 3 planes with him. 3. Heading north on I95 in Virginia when I saw a light moving around quickly north of where I was. This object would move east and then west. 4. I am a medium and psychic and saw 3 men talking to each other at a shopping center in Myrtle Beach, SC. The were sitting apart from each other which I thought was very unusual. So I sat down with them. Only one of them would talk to me. He told me he was from Winston-Salem, NC which I knew was a lie. Then his wife showed up who only stood around 5 ft. tall. She said very little and carried no pocketbook but what was really bizarre was I received a feeling that they were not human even though they looked like it. So I asked them who they really were and then they stopped talking to me. I talked to them for at least 20 min. and they said very little. I got up and shook their hands and they were cold and sweaty.
